channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Mailchimp for WooCommerce
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Mailchimp for WooCommerce

item.title: CVE-2022-2267|2024-08-03T00:32:09.262Z -- unknown -- mailchimp%20for%20woocommerce
item.description: The Mailchimp for WooCommerce WordPress plugin before 2.7.1 has an AJAX action that allows any logged in users (such as subscriber) to perform a POST request on behalf of the server to the internal network/LAN, the body of the request is also appended to the response so it can be used to scan private network for example

item.title: CVE-2022-2556|2024-08-03T00:39:07.985Z -- unknown -- mailchimp%20for%20woocommerce
item.description: The Mailchimp for WooCommerce WordPress plugin before 2.7.2 has an AJAX action that allows high privilege users to perform a POST request on behalf of the server to the internal network/LAN, the body of the request is also appended to the response so it can be used to scan private network for example
